REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3433 reute d f BC-PACIFIC-STOCK-EXCHANG 10-20 0049

TEXT.TITLE: PACIFIC STOCK EXCHANGE CLOSING FIGURES DELAYED
TEXT.BODY: The Pacific Stock Exchange said that due to huge backups and computer difficulties, its closing figures would not be available until later this evening. The exchange did not specify what time the figures would be released. Reuter
